overview: What to wear for tonight's meeting? This is exhausting... Steve's glad when Shalina jumps in to help him get ready to go out. But right after, she makes it impossible for him to leave.  Date night! Thomas quickly jumps into the shower while Claudia is doing her make-up and slowly gets her favorite dress on, her tights and her shoes. When it is time to go, Thomas can't keep his eyes off her, and his hands either.  He called and said he would be there in 30 minutes, so Vanessa is getting ready. Good , nice dress, sexy heels. But then, he keeps her waiting...
title: Undressed
